title: The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 26
description:
The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 26:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Baily & Taylor (Eds.) - Across the Great Divide; New Perspectives on the Financial Crisis (2014)

-  Batra - Greenspan's Fraud; How Two Decades of His Policies Have Undermined the Global Economy (2005)

-  Callaghan et al (Eds.) - Global Cooperation Among G20 Countries; Responding to the Crisis and Restoring Growth (2014)

-  Choi - Governments and Markets in East Asia; the Politics of Economic Crises (2006)

-  Cubbage & Brooks - Corporate Security in the Asia-Pacific Region; Crisis, Crime, Fraud, and Misconduct (2013)

-  Desai - Hubris; Why Economists Failed to Predict the Crisis and How to Avoid the Next One (2015)

-  Dimou - On the Unhappiness of Being Greek (2013)

-  Durkin et al - Consumer Credit and the American Economy (2014)

-  Fadda & Tridico (Eds.) - The Economic Crisis in Social and Institutional Context; Theories, Policies and Exit Strategies (2015)

-  Flassbeck & Lapavitsas - Against the Troika; Crisis and Austerity in the Eurozone (2015)

-  Fremon - The Great Depression in United States History (2014)

-  Gold - Fiduciary Finance; Investment Funds and the Crisis in Financial Markets (2010)

-  Heller - Grid Lock Economy; How Too Much Ownership Wrecks Markets, Stops Innovation, and Costs Lives (2008)

-  Insana - How to Make a Fortune from the Biggest Bailout in U.S. History; a Guide to the 7 Greatest Bargains from Main Street to Wall Street (2009)

-  Kindleberger & Aliber - Manias, Panics and Crashes; a History of Financial Crises, 6e (2011)

-  Lim & Mercurio (Eds.) - International Economic Law after the Global Crisis; a Tale of Fragmented Disciplines (2015)

-  Lin et al - National Intellectual Capital and the Financial Crisis in Brazil, Russia, India, China, Korea, and South Africa (2013)

-  Lin et al - National Intellectual Capital and the Financial Crisis in China, Hong Kong, Singapore, and Taiwan (2013)

-  Mahoney - Wasting a Crisis; Why Securities Regulation Fails (2015)

-  Markham - A Financial History of the United States from the Subprime Crisis to the Great Recession, 2006-2009 (2011)

-  Martin - A Decade of Delusions; From Speculative Contagion to the Great Recession (2011)

-  McGee & Preobragenskaya - Accounting and Financial System Reform in Eastern Europe and Asia (2006)

-  McLean - Shaky Ground; the Strange Saga of the US Mortgage Giants (2015)

-  Oppenheimer - Madoff with the Money (2009)

-  Pandit - The Global Financial Crisis and the Indian Economy (2015)

-  Parsson - Dying of Money; Lessons of the Great German and American Inflations (1974)

-  Roitman - Anti-Crisis (2014)

-  Rosefielde & Mills - Global Economic Turmoil and the Public Good (2015)

-  See-Yan - The Global Economy in Turbulent Times (2015)

-  Skarbec - The 100 Most Important American Financial Crises; an Encyclopedia of the Lowest Points in American Economic History (2015)

-  Spitznagel - The DAO of Capital; Austrian Investing in a Distorted World (2013)

-  Steele - Behind the News; Global Financial Crisis (2014)

-  Sturzenegger & Zettelmeyer - Debt Defaults and Lessons from a Decade of Crises (2006)

-  Ugeux - International Finance Regulation; the Quest for Financial Stability (2014)

-  Wolman & Colamosca - The Great 401(k) Hoax; Why Your Family's Financial Security Is at Risk, and What You Can Do about It (2003)
